description:
A patch to help the codereview hg extension play nicely with MQ
If you received this message it has passed its first.

messages.text:
Hello rsc (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change.

Please complete the CLA as described at
http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright
so that I can apply this patch.

Thanks.

On 19/05/10 15:40, rsc@golang.org wrote:
> Please complete the CLA as described at
> http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright
> so that I can apply this patch.

Done (electronically).

Peter

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c7ac1ecc0ac6 ***
